title: Something minor but like
body: Can the Pharaoh Nidalee slpash art be updated? The Chinese one looks really good and with Riot updating a lot of slpash arts in the recent past, I feel like its has been forgotten. I have attached the current one and the Chinese one.

replies.body: IMO neither is on par with the current quality and standards of the "classic" splashes.

That's so much better, why don't we have this?
The current splash is my least favorite atm.
Same. I love her and have all of her other skins but I don't like the splash for this one. Idk the slpash is something important going into if i want to get a skin or not.
Most of the Korean and Chinese arts are 100x  better look at all of the Sivir splash's the difference is like stupid obvious
Not better than the newer Splash Arts though
Old League Art looks so bad lol
